root.name: Another Century's Episode 3: The Final
root.description: Featured SeriesA list of the anime series which are featured in the game.ReturningMobile Suit Gundam: Char's CounterattackMobile Fighter G GundamNew Mobile Report Gundam Wing: Endless WaltzAura Battler DunbineSuper Dimensional Fortress Macross: Do You Remember Love?Metal Armor DragonarMartian Successor Nadesico: The Prince of DarknessBrain PowerdWings of ReanA.C.E Originals (Original characters created for A.C.E 2)NewMobile Suit GundamAfter War Gundam XTurn A GundamMobile Suit Gundam SEEDGetter Robo ArmageddonMacross PlusOverman King GainerPsalm of Planets Eureka SevenRemovedMobile Suit Gundam 0083: Stardust MemoryHeavy Metal L-GaimBlue Comet SPT LayznerMartian Successor NadesicoThis game breaks the A.C.E. series' rule of being strictly Real Robot-based (aside from the debatable G Gundam) by including Getter Robo Armageddon, a purely Super Robot series.
